paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance.

paragraphs.content: Make haste, O God, to deliver me; make haste to help me, O LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Make haste, O God, to deliver me; make haste to help me, O Lord.

paragraphs.content: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.

paragraphs.content: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.

paragraphs.content: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.

paragraphs.content: But I am poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou art my help and my deliverer; O LORD, make no tarrying.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I am poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou art my help and my deliverer; O Lord, make no tarrying.
